name: Wheel of Time Quiz | Mixed Wheel of Time | 15 Questions

questions.text: Who is the MAIN CHARACTER of The Wheel of Time?
questions.explanation:
Rand al'Thor.

	Rand is the main character. He is also the Dragon Reborn and the savior of the world.

questions.text: Who is NOT a major character (i.e., only in one book, one scene, a few chapters, etc.)?
questions.explanation:
Heran Adan.

	He's just the governor of Baerlon.

questions.text: Which is not a name for the Dark One?
questions.explanation:
Lord of the Night.

	Lord of the Night is not a name for the Dark One, however, Lord of the Grave and Shepherd of the Night are.

questions.text: What is the Dark One's true name?
questions.explanation:
Shai'tan.

	Saying the Dark One's true name brings about ill fortune at best and disaster at worst.

questions.text: Who is a Hunter of the Horn?
questions.explanation:
Faile.

	Perrin is Faile's husband, Hurin is a Sniffer and Thom is a gleeman.

questions.text: Who holds Moghedien's soul in a cour'sourva?
questions.explanation:
Moridin.

	Moridin also holds Cyndane's soul in a separate cour'sourva.

questions.text: Who or what was Padan Fain before he became a hound of the Dark One?
questions.explanation:
A peddler.

	Dear old Padan met with the mysterious, ghostly Mordeth, they meshed, and the result was pure evil.

questions.text: What creature can change form and apparently can only be harmed by Mat's medallion?
questions.explanation:
Gholam.

	The Gholam, created by Aginor, who would be the equivalent of a mad scientist, I guess.

questions.text: What animal is Mat's medallion shaped like?
questions.explanation:
Fox & Foxhead & Fox Head.

	And it can ward off women channeling.

questions.text: Who fell into the twisted redstone doorway while grappling with Lanfear?
questions.explanation:
Moiraine.

	Much speculation exists about her possible return, some of this is cleared up in later books.

questions.text: What is the name given to the thirteen most powerful Aes Sedai who went over to the Dark One?
questions.explanation:
Forsaken.

	Aginor, Balthamel, Bel'al, Moghedien, Semirhage, Mesaana, Sammael, Demandred, Lanfear, Asmodean, Rahvin, Graendal, and Ishamael.

questions.text: Who was Osan-gar disguised as in the 8th and 9th books?
questions.explanation:
Corlan Dashiva.

	Yes, Corlan Dashiva, the crazy, scatterbrained Asha'man who tried to kill Rand on numerous occasions.

questions.text: Who, according to the Eel'finn and Ael'finn, is Matrim destined to marry?
questions.correct: Daughter of the Nine Moons & The Daughter of the Nine Moons
questions.explanation:
Daughter of the Nine Moons & The Daughter of the Nine Moons.

	The Daughter of the Nine Moons. Supposedly the daughter of the Empress of the Seanchan.

questions.text: Which of these best describes the hair of the Daughter of the Nine Moon's as she normally appears?
questions.explanation:
She's bald.

	Yes, her assistant, Selucia, shaves her head every morning.

questions.text: Who is the captain of the Spray (Boat)?
questions.explanation:
Bayle Domon.

	Bayle is one of my favorite characters - Very jolly.
